classSpec.desc: groups elements which can occur between, but not within, paragraphs and other chunks.
agrupa elementos que pueden aparecer entre p√°rrafos u otras divisiones, pero no dentro de estos.
raggruppa elementi che compaiono tra paragrafi e altre porzioni di testo ma non al loro interno

remarks.p: Note that this element class does not include members of the inter class, which can appear either within or between chunks. Unlike elements of that class, chunks cannot occur within chunks.
